options.content:
Individual Globus Tasks

This dashboard shows per-Globus Task level data, given a particular source and destination organization.
The table shows the volume, rate, duration (in hours, minutes and seconds) for the top 1000 largest tasks.
Click on the timestamp of an individual task to show more detailed information about that task.
All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.src_organization:$src AND meta.dst_organization:$dest AND meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND (( (!(_exists_:meta.src_ip)) OR meta.src_ip:${subnet.regex}*) OR ( (!(_exists_:meta.dst_ip)) OR meta.dst_ip:${subnet.regex}*))
